hibernate-mapping.query: from Entity entity join entity.semanticPropertyCollection semanticProperty where semanticProperty.conceptCode = ?
from Association association where association.entity.name = ? AND association.sourceRole.name = ?
from Association association where association.entity.name = ? AND association.name = ? AND association.targetEntity.name = ?
from Association association where association.name = ?
from Association association where association.entity.id = ? AND association.targetEntity.id = ?
select association.id from Association association where association.entity.id = ? AND association.targetEntity.id = ?

from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.abstractEntity.id in (select entity.id from Entity entity join entity.entityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.id = ?)
from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.abstractEntity.id = ?
from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.abstractEntity.id = ?
from Control control where control.baseAbstractAttribute.id = ?

select container.id,container.caption from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.abstractEntity.id in (select entity.id from Entity entity join entity.entityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.id = ?)
select container.id,container.abstractEntity.createdDate from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container
select container.id,container.caption from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container
select container.id,container.caption,container.abstractEntity.description from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container
select container.abstractEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.id = ?
select entityGroup.name,entityGroup.id from EntityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.isSystemGenerated = false AND entityGroup.name not like 'deprecated%'
from EntityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.name not like 'deprecated%'
select entityGroup.name,entityGroup.id from EntityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.isSystemGenerated = false AND entityGroup.id = ?
select count(*) from EntityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.name = ?
from Entity entity where entity.parentEntity.id = ?
from Association association where association.id = ?
from Association association where association.targetEntity.id = ?

select new edu.wustl.common.beans.NameValueBean(mainContainers.caption , mainContainers.id) from EntityGroup entityGroup join entityGroup.mainContainerCollection as mainContainers where entityGroup.id = ?
select container.caption from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.id = ?

select container.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container,edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.AbstractEntity abstractEntity, edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Entity entity where container.id = ? AND container.abstractEntity.id = entity.id AND entity.abstract = ?

select container.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container,edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.AbstractEntity abstractEntity, edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryEntity categoryentity where container.id = ? AND container.abstractEntity.id = categoryentity.id
select association.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Association association where association.targetEntity.id = ?
select count(*) from AttributeRecord attributeRecord where attributeRecord.entity.id = ? AND attributeRecord.attribute.id = ?
from AttributeRecord collectionAttributeRecord where collectionAttributeRecord.entity.id = ? AND collectionAttributeRecord.attribute.id = ? AND collectionAttributeRecord.recordId = ?
select catEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryEntity catEntity where catEntity.containerCollection.id=?
select category.name , category.rootCategoryElement.containerCollection.id , category.rootCategoryElement.entity from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category order by category.name asc
select tableProperty.name from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container join container.abstractEntity.tablePropertiesCollection tableProperty where container.id = ?
select catEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container join container.abstractEntity catEntity where container.id = ?

select columnColl.name from Association association join association.constraintPropertiesCollection constraintColl join constraintColl.tgtEntityConstraintKeyPropertiesCollection tgtkeyColl join tgtkeyColl.tgtForiegnKeyColumnPropertiesCollection columnColl join association.targetEntity.containerCollection contColl where association.entity.id = ? and contColl.id = ?
select category.rootCategoryElement.entity from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category join category.rootCategoryElement.containerCollection contColl where contColl.id= ?
select entityGroup.id from EntityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.name = ?
select entity.id from Entity entity where entity.entityGroup.id = ? and entity.name = ?
select entity.id from Entity entity where entity.name = ?
select absAttr.id from AbstractAttribute absAttr where absAttr.entity.id = ? and absAttr.name = ?
select absAttr.id from AbstractAttribute absAttr where absAttr.entity.id = ? and (absAttr.name like ? or absAttr.name like ?)
select attr.attributeTypeInformationCollection from Attribute attr where attr.id = ?
select container.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.caption=?
select category.name from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category where category.rootCategoryElement.id =?
select categoryEntity.entity from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryEntity categoryEntity where categoryEntity.id=?
select category.rootCategoryElement.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category where category.name =?
select entity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Entity entity where entity.entityGroup.id = ?
select container.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.abstractEntity.id = ?
select association.targetEntity.id from Association association where association.id = ? AND association.isCollection = ?
select container.caption from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.abstractEntity.id = ?
select entityGroup.name,entityGroup.id from EntityGroup entityGroup where entityGroup.isSystemGenerated = true

select entity.entityGroup.name from Entity entity where entity.name = ? AND entity.id = (select container.abstractEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.id = ?)
select pathAssociation.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.PathAssociationRelation pathAssociation where pathAssociation.path.id =? order by pathAssociation.id desc
select pathAssociation.association.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.PathAssociationRelation pathAssociation where pathAssociation.id =?
select association.entity.name from Association association where association.id =?
select association.targetEntity.name from Association association where association.id =?
select pathAssociation.sourceInstanceId from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.PathAssociationRelation pathAssociation where pathAssociation.id =?
select pathAssociation.targetInstanceId from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.PathAssociationRelation pathAssociation where pathAssociation.id =?
select catEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryEntity catEntity
select catEntity.name from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryEntity catEntity where catEntity.id=?
select catAttribute from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryAttribute catAttribute where catAttribute.isCalculated = true
select eg.longName from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.EntityGroup eg where eg.taggedValueCollection.key='PackageName' and eg.taggedValueCollection.value=?
select staticCategory.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.StaticCategory staticCategory where staticCategory.name=?
select new edu.wustl.common.beans.NameValueBean(staticCategory.name, staticCategory.id) from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.StaticCategory staticCategory
from edu.common.dynamicextensions.skiplogic.SkipLogic skipLogic where skipLogic.containerIdentifier = ?

select category.taggedValueCollection from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category where category.rootCategoryElement.id in ( select catEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.CategoryEntity catEntity where catEntity.id in ( select container.abstractEntity.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.userinterface.Container container where container.id = ? ) )
from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.SkipLogicAttribute
select category.rootCategoryElement.containerCollection.id from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category where category.name = ?
from EntityGroup eg where eg.name = ?
select category.rootCategoryElement.entity.id,category.rootCategoryElement.containerCollection.id, category.name from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category
select category.processorClass from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.Category category where category.rootCategoryElement.containerCollection.id = ?
select staticCategory.metadataContainerId from edu.common.dynamicextensions.domain.StaticCategory staticCategory where staticCategory.id = ?
